full_text: MATERIALS Color A: 4 (6, 7) skeins of Purl Soho’s Worsted Twist , 100% merino wool. Each skein is 164 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 656 (984, 1148) yards required. Color B: 6 (8, 10) skeins of Purl Soho’s Alpaca Pure , 100% super baby alpaca. Each skein is 109 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 654 (872, 1090) yards required. You will also need… A US 8 (5.0 mm), 24 or 32-inch circular needle GAUGE 19 stitches and 38 rows = 4 inches in Mosaic Stitch, using Colors A and B 15 stitches and 32 rows = 4 inches in garter stitch, using Color A SIZES Baby (Crib, Throw) Approximately 26 x 35 (33½ x 40, 41 x 46½) inches Sample: We knit the Baby size.
name: Ravelry: Mosaic Blanket pattern by Purl Soho
